description: Sex and Submission presents Part 2 of "Bound for the Apocalypse," a Feature Presentation. Darling is naked and alone in the desert after escaping the chains of a cruel post-apocalyptic hunter only to be captured by another hunter who uses his sex slave, Marica Hase, as bait. Beautifully shot in a spectacular outdoor desert location and abandoned house. Includes role-play, anal sex, bondage and corporal punishment!
title: Bound for the Apocalypse: Part 2
